Class.name: Temporal.Generators
Class.Description: Class, all methods for class propertyGet, propertyGetStatic, propertySet methods for property

Method.name: generateAllMethods
Method.Implementation:
set sc = ..generateProperiesMethods(class) quit:$$$ISERR(sc) sc
set sc = ..generateClassMethods(class) quit:$$$ISERR(sc) sc
quit class.%Save()

Method.name: generateProperiesMethods
Method.Implementation: #dim sc As %Status = $$$OK for i=1:1:class.Properties.Count() { #dim property As %Dictionary.PropertyDefinition set property = class.Properties.GetAt(i) CONTINUE:property.Parameters.GetAt("TIMEPROPERTY")'=$$$YES // Property is not a time roperty set sc = ..generatePropertyMethods(class, property) quit:$$$ISERR(sc) } quit sc

Method.name: generatePropertyMethods
Method.Implementation:
#dim sc As %Status = $$$OK
set sc = ..generatePropertyGet(class, property) quit:$$$ISERR(sc) sc
set sc = ..generatePropertyGetStatic(class, property) quit:$$$ISERR(sc) sc
set sc = ..generatePropertySet(class, property) quit:$$$ISERR(sc) sc
set sc = ..setPropertyObject(class, property) quit sc

Method.name: generatePropertyGet
Method.Implementation:
#dim sc As %Status = $$$OK
#dim method As %Dictionary.MethodDefinition = ..getPropertyMethod(class, property, "Get")
set method.ClassMethod = $$$NO set method.Description = property.Name _ " getter method in object context" set method.ReturnType = property.Type
set code = ##class(Temporal.GeneratorsProperty).getCode("Get", property.Name, ..getGlobal(class, property)) do method.Implementation.Write(code) quit method.%Save()

Method.name: generatePropertyGetStatic
Method.Implementation:
#dim sc As %Status = $$$OK
#dim method As %Dictionary.MethodDefinition = ..getPropertyMethod(class, property, "GetStatic")
set method.ClassMethod = $$$YES set method.Description = property.Name _ " getter method in SQL context" set method.FormalSpec = "id:%Integer" set method.ReturnType = property.Type
set code = ##class(Temporal.GeneratorsProperty).getCode("GetStatic", property.Name, ..getGlobal(class, property)) do method.Implementation.Write(code) quit method.%Save()

Method.name: generatePropertySet
Method.Implementation:
#dim sc As %Status = $$$OK
#dim method As %Dictionary.MethodDefinition = ..getPropertyMethod(class, property, "Set")
set method.ClassMethod = $$$NO set method.Description = property.Name _ " setter method in object context" set method.ReturnType = "%Status" set method.FormalSpec = "val:" _ property.Type
set code = ##class(Temporal.GeneratorsProperty).getCode("Set", property.Name, ..getGlobal(class, property)) do method.Implementation.Write(code) quit method.%Save()

Method.name: setPropertyObject
generateClassMethods
Method.Implementation:
#dim sc As %Status = $$$OK /// Method %OnAfterSave(insert As %Boolean) As %Status [ Private, ServerOnly = 1 ] #dim method As %Dictionary.MethodDefinition = ..getMethod(class, "%OnAfterSave")
set method.ClassMethod = $$$NO set method.Description = "Execute after each save to store temporal data" set method.ReturnType = "%Status" set method.FormalSpec = "insert:%Boolean" set method.Private = $$$YES set method.ServerOnly = $$$YES
do method.Implementation.Write($$$TAB _ "set ts = ..ts2unixtime()" _ $$$NL _ $$$TAB _ "set id = ..%Id()")
for i=1:1:class.Properties.Count() { #dim property As %Dictionary.PropertyDefinition set property = class.Properties.GetAt(i) CONTINUE:property.Parameters.GetAt("TIMEPROPERTY")'=$$$YES // Property is not a time roperty set code = ##class(Temporal.GeneratorsProperty).getSaveCode(property.Name, ..getGlobal(class, property), property.Type) do method.Implementation.Write(code) } do method.Implementation.Write($$$TAB _ "quit $$$OK") quit method.%Save()

Method.name: getPropertyMethod
Method.Implementation: set methodName = property.Name _ methodType quit ..getMethod(class, methodName)

Method.name: getMethod
